title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A novel set in the Jazz Age that tells the story of Jay Gatsby and his unrequited love for Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful story about racial injustice in the Deep South, seen through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel that explores the dangers of totalitarianism and extreme political ideology.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romantic novel that explores themes of love, class, and reputation in 19th-century England.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy adventure that follows Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to reclaim treasure guarded by a dragon.
